name: Auto (Ritchi, rhino_min)
description:
Controls:

Drive Forward: W / 🡱
Drive Backwards: S / 🡳
Steer: A D / 🡰 🡲
Use Item: LSHIFT / E
Drift: SPACEBAR
Respawn: (Hold) FChange Camera: C
Show Scoreboard: TAB
Open In Game Menu: ESC

----------------------------------------------

Game Modes:
Elimination: The player with the lowest score gets eliminated every 60 seconds. Last man/car standing wins!

Free Roam: Leisurely drive around maps!

(More coming soon)

----------------------------------------------
